mapper.select: select t.tutor_id, t.name as tutor_name, email, c.course_id, c.name, description, start_date, end_date from tutors t left join courses c on t.tutor_id= c.tutor_id where t.tutor_id= #{tutorId}
mapper.insert: insert into tutors (tutor_id, name, email, phone, addr_id) values (#{tutorId}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{address.addrId})
